snippet: TABB--Stephen (Steve), passed away on Saturday, February 6th at the age of 89. He was born in Brooklyn, New York. He is survived by his wife, Jeanette Tabb, and his four daughters, sons-in- law and grandchildren. Funeral Services will be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel at noon on Monday, February 8th. 1/3
lead_paragraph: TABB--Stephen (Steve), passed away on Saturday, February 6th at the age of 89. He was born in Brooklyn, New York. He is survived by his wife, Jeanette Tabb, and his four daughters, sons-in- law and grandchildren. Funeral Services will be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel at noon on Monday, February 8th. 1/3
